message.raw:
Fixed a bug where the "WARNING" message regarding the overwriting of a value would display the new value in the specified units, but the old value in base units.

This would give the false impression that values were being overwritten and changed to a new value, even when the values were identical.

All values are now displayed in base units, and the error message has been updated to reflect this.
